# The `ExtraInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Internal implementation detail class that provides out-of-line storage for extra info used by the machine instruction when this info cannot be stored in-line within the instruction itself. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MachineInstr::ExtraInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Internal implementation detail class that provides out-of-line storage for extra info used by the machine instruction when this info cannot be stored in-line within the instruction itself.

This has to be defined eagerly due to the implementation constraints of <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointersumtype">PointerSumType</a></code> where it is used.

Definition at line 160 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstr-h">MachineInstr.h</a>.
